title: OpenAI acquires Global Illumination
summary: OpenAI has acquired the team from Global Illumination, a company known for using AI to create innovative tools and digital experiences. The team, which has a strong background in designing and building products for companies like Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, and Google, will now be working on OpenAI's core products, including ChatGPT. OpenAI is thrilled about the potential impact this talented team will have on their organization.
